name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Lead Software Engineer with 8 years of experience, I have a proven track record in building high-performance solutions across industries, leveraging **Java**, **Spring Boot**, **Python**, and **Microservices** architecture. My expertise includes implementing **Agile** methodologies, **TDD**, and **DevOps** practices while utilizing cloud technologies with **AWS**, **Azure**, and **GCP**. I have extensive experience with **CI/CD** pipelines, **Docker**, and **Kubernetes**, ensuring efficient deployment and robust application performance.

I have successfully led the development of complex systems that adhere to compliance standards and prioritize **Code Quality** through numerous best practices in **Automated Testing** and **Software Architecture**. My strong communication skills enable me to mentor teams effectively and drive collaborative efforts on projects. I am also experienced in integrating AI/ML functionalities and developing machine learning workflows, enhancing operational efficiency and innovation.
